name: Ernie McCoy
introduction: Ernest Musser, who raced as Ernie McCoy, (born February 19th 1921 in Reading, Pennsylvania; died February 4th 2001 in Reading) was a United States driver who competed in the Formula One regulation Indianapolis 500 races in 1953 and 1954, driving Stevens and KurtisKraft cars respectively.  Although he scored no points, McCoy was a classified finisher in both races.
